gui.batches

Class AddItemBatchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.common.Controller
      • gui.batches.AddItemBatchController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAddItemBatchController, IController

    public class AddItemBatchController
extends Controller
implements IAddItemBatchController
    Controller class for the add item batch view.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem()
      This method is called when the user clicks the "Add Item" button in the add item batch view.
      void barcodeChanged()
      This method is called when the "Product Barcode" field in the add item batch view is changed by the user.
      void countChanged()
      This method is called when the "Count" field in the add item batch view is changed by the user.
      void done()
      This method is called when the user clicks the "Done" button in the add item batch view.
      protected void enableComponents()
      Sets the enable/disable state of all components in the controller's view.
      void entryDateChanged()
      This method is called when the "Entry Date" field in the add item batch view is changed by the user.
      protected IAddItemBatchView getView()
      Returns a reference to the view for this controller.
      protected void loadValues()
      Loads data into the controller's view.
      void redo()
      This method is called when the user clicks the "Redo" button in the add item batch view.
      void selectedProductChanged()
      This method is called when the selected product changes in the add item batch view.
      void undo()
      This method is called when the user clicks the "Undo" button in the add item batch view.
      void useScannerChanged()
      This method is called when the "Use Barcode Scanner" setting in the add item batch view is changed by the user.
